subject: Native Americans
Football
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Thorpe’s remains will stay in Jim Thorpe, Pa., despite the tribe and family of the famed athlete asking to have his remains returned to his boyhood home in what is now Oklahoma.
snippet: Thorpe’s remains will stay in Jim Thorpe, Pa., despite the tribe and family of the famed athlete asking to have his remains returned to his boyhood home in what is now Oklahoma.
